getFormatMap

public java.util.HashMap getFormatMap()
Description copied from class: AeMessageFormatter
Override to populate the format map. This method should initialize a static map the first time it is called. The map is maintained at the subclass level, rather than here, so that different subclasses can maintain different format mappings simultaneously, e.g., a Simulator can be running in one editor page, with a set of simulator message formats, while a Live Debugger can be running in another page using a (different) set of debugger message formats.

Specified by:
getFormatMap in class AeMessageFormatter
See Also:
AeMessageFormatter.getFormatMap()

getFormatString

public java.lang.String getFormatString(java.lang.String aKey)
Description copied from class: AeMessageFormatter
Implementors will provide the format string accessor applicable to their environment. If no format string is mapped to the specified key, then the key itself is returned (not null, not an empty string).

Overrides:
getFormatString in class AeEngineEventFormatter
See Also:
AeMessageFormatter.getFormatString(java.lang.String)

convertToArray

protected java.lang.Object[] convertToArray(IAeBaseProcessEvent aEvent)
Converts the event into an array for use in the formatting routine.

Parameters:
aEvent - The info event to be formatted for output.
